snippet.title: Johnny Depp Gets Elon Musk’s Help Testifying Against Amber Heard?!
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp Gets Elon Musk’s Help Testifying Against Amber Heard?!

Subscribe to Binge Watch -  http://tiny.cc/bingewatch

WATCH NEXT 👇🏻

James Franco Reacts To Being Subpoenaed By Johnny’s Legal Team…

https://youtu.be/6kY_mgsoOow

10 Celebrities That Defended Dave Chappelle Against Cancel Culture

https://youtu.be/XZCETuqR5ig

Related videos:

Elon Musk Wants to SUPPORT Johnny Depp By Testifying Against Amber in 2022

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IQc-w9hgVv8

Elon Musk Set To Testify Against Amber Heard & Defend Johnny Depp

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A5xAuPZaoI8

Divorce is never easy, and when it comes to celebrity divorce, public attention is added to the whole nightmare that follows the process. Of course, Johnny Depp and Amber Heard’s split is certainly no exception. Even though their legal battle has already lasted years, there's a little chance that new participants of the case, like Tesla CEO Elon Musk and actor James Franco, end up testifying in the court case against Amber Heard?
According to court documents obtained by Us Weekly, James Franco and Elon Musk were subpoenaed on October 26, 2021. They were ordered to “produce the books, record, electronically stored information and tangible things designated and described” — including “verbal conversations, telephone calls, letters, emails, memoranda and reports” — by January 17, 2022. As we have already spoken in details about James Franco being dragged to the case in the previous video (if you haven’t seen it, you definitely should), in this episode we are going to reveal all the details about Elon Musk’s who once challenged Johnny Depp to a cage fight. 
Johnny Depp’s legal team is interested in speaking with Elon Mus kand James Franco because they may have a really important information that can help the case going. Here is an official Adam Waldman’s (JD’s lawyer) statement: “We are interested in James Franco and Elon Musk as fact witnesses because we have evidence they are men who saw Amber Heard’s face in the days and nights between when she claimed Mr. Depp smashed her in the face on May 21 and when she went to court with painted on ‘bruises’ to obtain temporary restraining order on May 27”.
The Tesla billionaire Elon Musk has been involved in Johnny Depp and Amber Heard’s case once again and this time around his connection to Amber/Johnny drama is a little bit different than previously. In short, Elon Musk has been involved to the entire scandal because he dated Amber Heard after the former couple’s split. Elon was first dragged into the dispute last year when Johnny Depp issued subpoena against him. This was part from a separate legal battle between the former couple in the US. 
But what does Elon have to do with everything that happens on the first place? Well, Elon Musk and Amber Heard had a short-lived romance after her marriage to Johnny Depp collapsed in 2016. However, though JD repeatedly has alleged that Elon and Amber Heard were romantically involved while before their split. Elon Musk has always denied these claims and even joked last summer about settling things with Johnny Depp in a “cage fight” when his name kept coming up at the ongoing UK libel trial. 
Moreover, when Amber and JD’s relationship began to fall apart, Amber was trying to get a restraining order against Johnny Depp and when she decided to this, she shared her thoughts about it with Elon Musk. After she revealed him her thoughts, he offered to pay and provide her with 24-hour security. Moreover, the High Court was told that Elon Musk became a regular late-night visitor to Amber Heard monthly. And allegedly, it all started way back in 2015. And you probably remember that ‘triangle’ scandal, involving Elon Musk, Amber Heard and British supermodel Cara Delevingne.Well, so many views and opinions. Bit I want to know your thoughts about the entire situation! Do you think Elon Musk’s testimony will help Johnny Depp win the court case? Or the fact that Elon Musk will appear in court will make things only worse for the actor? Let me know your opinion in the comments section down below. And thanks for watching this video and don’t forget to hit that subscribe button and turn on a notification bell. Bye-bye.
